alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Clinton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 7:37PM CDT until June 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CLINTON AND WESTERN CALDWELL COUNTIES... At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Kingston, or 8 miles northeast of Lathrop, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Hamilton and Kingston. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 39 and 53. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
